title:
What\'s up with the ATT outtage, now going on 12+ hours? They told me that a dc power plant failure was responsible, and that over 450 customers in southern NC and SC are affected. I\'ve never know this to happen. 



Does anyone have more information?



Thanks,

Sussi
text:
